app.name: Zapmail
app.description: An email client designed to organize communications by separating important emails from general ones using focused spaces and contact management.

features.name: Focused Space
features.description: A dedicated VIP section for important conversations, containing emails from workspace members and saved contacts.

features.name: General Space
features.description: A separate inbox space where all emails not classified as focused or from saved contacts are automatically sorted.

features.name: Save Contact
features.description: The ability to manually save a sender as a contact via their profile, ensuring their future emails appear in the Focused Space.

features.name: Sidebar Notifications
features.description: Visual indicators in the sidebar that highlight where attention is needed and where new activity has occurred.

screens.name: Focused Inbox
screens.description: The main dashboard view showing the email inbox with the 'Focused' tab active, displaying a list of priority conversations.

screens.name: General Inbox
screens.description: The inbox view after switching to the 'General' tab, displaying a list of other emails.

screens.name: Email Detail View
screens.description: The detailed view of a specific email thread opened from the General list.

screens.name: Contact Profile Panel
screens.description: A slide-out panel on the right side showing profile details for the email sender.

screens.name: Save Contact Form
screens.description: An editing form that appears to save the contact's information.

screens.name: Inbox with Notifications
screens.description: The inbox view highlighting notification badges on specific email threads in the sidebar.

flow.flow_goal: To demonstrate how to navigate between email contexts (Focused vs. General), view messages, and save new contacts from the email interface.

steps.title: Access Focused Inbox
steps.description: The user switches the view to see high-priority emails.
steps.user_action: Click on the 'Focused' tab in the left sidebar navigation.
steps.ui_context: Main email interface showing the inbox list.
steps.system_response: The email list filters to show only emails from workspace members and saved contacts.

steps.title: Open Focused Email
steps.description: The user selects a specific email from the Focused list to read.
steps.user_action: Click on the email thread from 'Dilki Fernando'.
steps.system_response: The selected email content loads in the main reading pane on the right.

steps.title: Access General Inbox
steps.description: The user switches the view to see other emails.
steps.user_action: Click on the 'General' tab in the left sidebar navigation.
steps.ui_context: Top navigation bar above the email list.
steps.system_response: The email list updates to show general emails, newsletters, and unsaved contacts.

steps.title: Open General Email
steps.description: The user opens an email from the General list.
steps.user_action: Click on the email thread from 'zapmailhq'.
steps.system_response: The email content (a receipt) loads in the main reading pane.

steps.title: Access Contact Options
steps.description: The user initiates the process to save the sender as a contact.
steps.user_action: Click on the profile header bar in the right-hand information sidebar.
steps.ui_context: Right sidebar displaying sender profile information.
steps.system_response: A dropdown menu appears with options for the contact.

steps.title: Select Save Contact
steps.description: The user chooses to save the current sender.
steps.user_action: Click 'Save Contact' from the dropdown menu.
steps.system_response: The view changes to an 'Edit Contact' form overlay.

steps.title: Confirm Contact Save
steps.description: The user finalizes saving the contact information.
steps.user_action: Click the 'Save' button at the bottom right of the form.
steps.system_response: The form closes, and the contact is saved to the system.

steps.title: View Notification
steps.description: The user navigates to a conversation with a new activity indicator.
steps.user_action: Click on the contact 'Mark Zap' which displays a red notification badge.
steps.system_response: The application opens the conversation thread associated with the notification.

interactions.name: Switch to General Tab
interactions.rationale: To view emails that are not categorized as 'Focused' or VIP, as explained by the narrator.
interactions.description: The user moves the cursor to the sidebar and clicks on the 'General' tab.
interactions.system_response: The email list view updates to display emails categorized under the General space.

interactions.name: Open Email
interactions.rationale: To view the contents of a specific email within the General list.
interactions.description: The user clicks on an email from 'zapmailhq@gmail...' in the list.
interactions.system_response: The selected email opens in the main reading pane, displaying the message details.

interactions.name: Open Profile Details
interactions.rationale: To access the sender's profile information and options, specifically to save them as a contact.
interactions.description: The user clicks on the top header bar of the open email view.
interactions.system_response: A profile information panel slides in from the right side of the screen.

interactions.name: Initiate Save Contact
interactions.rationale: To start the process of adding the current email sender to the saved contacts list.
interactions.description: The user clicks the 'Save Contact' link/button within the profile side panel.
interactions.system_response: The panel interface updates, revealing a 'Save' button at the bottom to confirm the action.

interactions.name: Confirm Save Contact
interactions.rationale: To finalize the action of saving the new contact.
interactions.description: The user clicks the 'Save' button located at the bottom of the profile panel.
interactions.ui_context: Footer of the right-side profile panel
interactions.system_response: The system saves the contact (implied as the video transitions).

interactions.name: Open Unread Email
interactions.rationale: To check a specific email that has a notification indicator, showing where attention is needed.
interactions.description: The user clicks on an email from 'Mark Zap' in the list.
interactions.system_response: The email content from Mark Zap loads in the main view.
